title: Bokura wa Mahou Shoujo no Naka - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Mystery   Romance   School Life   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Magical Girls   Magical Space   Male Protagonist   Thriller
author: Mikage Eiji   御影 瑛路
description: We have been imprisoned in the magical girl’s cage. In this confined world, we have to offer one student as a sacrifice once a week. And the one who was chosen is the person I love the most…>
